>>According to Chi's ICAP framework, as presented in the last section, of the three techniques listed, which do you think has the highest levels of learning gains?<< ( ) Passive ( ) Active (x) Constructive
[explanation] Miki's framework suggests that constructive learning is more effective than active learning, and active is more effective than passive.
